Welcome to the MigConnectivity package! We hope you find it helpful. We have several vignettes to help you navigate the package. 

1. [Worked Examples](WorkedExample.html) of processing data
1. The [estTransition](estTransition.html) function estimates migratory connectivity patterns (Ïˆ, transition probabilities) from seasonal movement data [@hostetler_challenges_nodate]
1. The [estStrength](estStrength.html) function estimates the strength of migratory connectivity (MC) from transition probabilities [@cohen_quantifying_2018; @roberts_migratory_2023]
1. The [diffMC](diffMC.html) function compares MC for two or more taxa [@cohen_strength_2019]
1. [Simulating and working with isotope data](simulateIsoMC.html) can be tough, so check out this vignette if you need to do one of those [@cohen_strength_2019]
1. Finally, we have an older vignette that this master one replaces, which includes lots of examples, but doesn't include the more recent functions. See our [Older Functionality](olderFunctionality.html) vignette
